PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-07812022-06-24,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
PrecisAppointment of MARK WATTON of Calgary, Alberta, to be a full-time Commissioner of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six years; and his designation as Lead Commissioner of the Canadian Energy Regulator, effective August 28, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
